title: Upcoming PVK Topics, Videos and Events for Fall 2018
description:
I'm back from vacation with a head full of ideas and ambitions, which is what vacation usually gives me. Here's what may be coming up. 

https://www.amazon.com/Midnight-Rising-Brown-Sparked-Civil-ebook/dp/B0051O9YBQ 

https://www.amazon.com/Between-Heaven-Hell-Somewhere-Kennedy-ebook/dp/B003WIZ63S 

https://www.amazon.com/1493-Uncovering-World-Columbus-Created-ebook/dp/B004G606EY 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republic_(Plato) 

https://www.audible.com/pd/Classics/Platos-Republic-Audiobook/B00DG67A0S 

https://www.audible.com/pd/Religion-Spirituality/Books-That-Matter-The-City-of-God-Audiobook/B01M3ODH4V

My sister's Chasing the Dream YouTube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp2zbBGVzhx9yKkx__ILIrw 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

You can donate to Living Stones CRC to support this work here http://www.livingstonescrc.org/donate 
Donations may be tax deductible for taxpayers of the United States
